section.heading: Penalties.
section.text: Any person who knowingly and willfully causes any document not to be published in the District of Columbia Statutes-at-Large, the District of Columbia Register, or the District of Columbia Municipal Regulations which is required to be so published pursuant to this subchapter shall be guilty of a misdemeanor and shall be fined not more than $100, or imprisoned not more than 30 days, or both.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Mar. 6, 1979, D.C. Law 2-153, § 4, 25 DCR 6960
